description:
Flagship of http://anidb.net/ch208 [Kesler]`s fleet. The lead ship of the Forseti-class, the other ships in the class being the http://anidb.net/ch1755 [Skirnir] and the http://anidb.net/ch1490 [Salamander].
Forseti was a god of justice and reconciliation in the Norse pantheon.
name: Forseti
